text:
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14
1% June 19^
To:
From:
Subject:
Grsydon Ausmus
Burton Paulu
For your information I am transmitting a copy of a letter I received from
M. Hutchinson. I shall not answer his letter because I do not think it requires
an answer from me; but if you wish to write to him before you leave for London,
that will be all right with me.
Enc.
BP:cjm
